summary: "Only Clouds..." is a film about eleven year old Maria, who has lost her little brother. Her mother disappears into her own sorrow, then Maria meets Jacob.
cast: Thea Sofie Rusten|Jan Tore Kristoffersen|Anneke von der Lippe|Anders T. Andersen|Eindride Eidsvold|Bjørn Jenseg|Helge Jordal|Jørgen Langhelle|Max Moland|Kari Simonsen|Arne Øyvin Slørdal|Andrine Sæther|Mads Weinholdt
title: Bare skyer beveger stjernene
